price: নিশ্চয় সি মহান আল্লাহৰ প্ৰতি ঈমান পোষণ কৰা নাছিল,
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: innahu kāna lā yu'minu bil-lahi al-ʿaẓīmi
